ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New skill caps
ygData.msgSnippet: i did not ask him but i will, though he didn t mention it going up at 54. also, what are our weapon skills going up per level?  i know my duel wield, 1h blunt
ygData.messageBody:
i did not ask him but i will, though he didn't mention it going up at 54.
also, what are our weapon skills going up per level? i know my duel wield,
1h blunt and 1h slashing are at 205 or 206 now, i miss it a lot in the
battle spam. so rather than the 5 per level, is it only 2 or 3? as long as
these levels are, i doubt i will not have any of those not maxed by the next
time i level.

Shada Powa, L52 Wood Elf Minstrel
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> Does it capped at 75 at 53rd level and not go any higher at 54?
